overview: Coldplay, live at the Glastonbury Festival 2011. Setlist: 1. Hurts Like Heaven 2. Yellow 3. In My Place 4. Major Minus 5. Lost! 6. The Scientist 7. Shiver 8. Violet Hill 9. God Put A Smile Upon Your Face (new arrangement) 10. Everything's Not Lost (first time since November 30, 2005) 11. Us Against the World 12. Politik 13. Viva La Vida 14. Charlie Brown 15. Life Is For Living Encore: 16. Clocks 17. Fix You (What A Wonderful World intro with alternate lyrics.) 18. Every Teardrop is a Waterfall
title: Coldplay: Live at Glastonbury 2011
